  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GroupableAction

    public class RepairActionUnit
extends RepairAction
    RepairActionUnit.java --- Repair action focused on repairing a Unit. This Class is separated from the RepairActionBuilding due to it containing different preconditions that a Unit executing this action must meet.
    Author:
    P H - 09.10.2017
